name: Fantasy
descr: A genre of fiction that concentrates on imaginary elements.

name: Horror
descr: A genre of fiction that is intended to frighten, scare, or disgust.

name: Science Fiction
descr: A genre of speculative fiction that typically deals with imaginative and futuristic concepts.

name: Mystery
descr: A genre of fiction that involves a mysterious death or crime to be solved.

name: Romance
descr: A genre of fiction that focuses on romantic relationships between characters.

name: Thriller
descr: A genre of fiction that is characterized by excitement, suspense, and tension.

name: Biography
descr: A genre of literature that tells the story of a person's life.
